text: xallxhˌ di thrng sayya kæ phwk cea sung thraphy chely xan makmay thi phwk cea ca di rab man doy phraxngkh thrng reng (thraphy chely thi khxybar) xan ni kæ phwk cea læa phraxngkh thrng yabyang mux khxng phukhn (phwk ya hud) cak (kar tharay) phwk cea læa pheux man (kar yabyang cak kar tharay) ca di pen sayyan hnung kæ brrda phu sraththa læa pheux phraxngkh ca di thrng chinæa thang kæ phwk cea su thang xan theiyngtrng
